name: HyperlinkPageItemSources
shortdesc: A collection of hyperlink page item sources.

method.name: add
method.shortdesc: Creates a new hyperlink page item source.

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new HyperlinkPageItemSource (Optional)

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the HyperlinkPageItemSource.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the HyperlinkPageItemSource with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the HyperlinkPageItemSource with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the HyperlinkPageItemSource with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the HyperlinkPageItemSources within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The HyperlinkPageItemSource, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: HyperlinkPageItemSource, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The HyperlinkPageItemSource, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: HyperlinkPageItemSource, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first HyperlinkPageItemSource in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last HyperlinkPageItemSource in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle HyperlinkPageItemSource in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the HyperlinkPageItemSource with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The index of the HyperlinkPageItemSource that follows the desired HyperlinkPageItemSource.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the HyperlinkPageItemSource whose index follows the specified HyperlinkPageItemSource in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The HyperlinkPageItemSource whose index comes before the desired HyperlinkPageItemSource.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any HyperlinkPageItemSource in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every HyperlinkPageItemSource in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the HyperlinkPageItemSource.
Returns the HyperlinkPageItemSource with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
